message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

In accounting, this is known as "Depreciation" - it's the process of allocating the cost of a tangible asset over its useful life.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see a specific line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 120631.67.

This is exactly what I'm looking for - the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '120631.67'} }
```
